  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Query Pix Incoming V2.X"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/pix-api/v2.x/pix/{e2eid}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Endpoint to query a Pix by e2eid V.2X.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"e2eid","schema":{"title":"EndToEndIdentification","description":"EndToEndIdentification transiting PACS002, PACS004 and PACS008","pattern":"[A-Z0-9]{32}","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Pix received","required":["endToEndId","valor","horario"],"type":"object","properties":{"chave":{"description":"# Key field format\n* Key field of the recipient as assigned in the respective PACS008.\n* The types of key can be: telephone, e-mail, cpf / cnpj or EVP.\n* The format of the keys can be found in the \"Formatting the DICT keys in the BR Code\" section of the\n [Standards Manual for initiating the\n Pix](https://www.bcb.gov.br/estabilidadefinanceira/pagamentosinstantaneos).\n","maxLength":77,"type":"string"},"devolucoes":{"title":"Devoluções","type":"array","items":{"title":"Reversal","required":["id","rtrId","valor","horario","status"],"type":"object","properties":{"horario":{"required":["solicitacao"],"type":"object","properties":{"liquidacao":{"format":"date-time","title":"Settlement Time","description":"Time at which the reversal was settled on the PSP.","type":"string"},"solicitacao":{"format":"date-time","title":"Request Time","description":"Time at which the reversal was requested on PSP.","type":"string"}}},"id":{"title":"Id of Reversal","description":"Id generated by the client to represent only a reversal.","pattern":"[A-Za-z0-9-]{1,36}","type":"string"},"natureza":{"description":"Indicates the nature of the return. A return can be related to a common Pix (corresponds to code MD06 of pacs.004), or to a Withdrawal or Change Pix (corresponds to code SL02 of pacs.004). In the absence of this field the nature shall be interpreted as being of a common Pix (ORIGINAL).\n\nThe natures are defined as follows:\n- ORIGINAL: when the return refers to a common Pix or to the purchase amount in a Change Pix;\n- RETIRADA: when the return refers to a Withdrawal Pix or to the amount of change in a Change Pix.\n\nThe return values are always limited to the maximum values according to:\n- Ordinary Pix: the return value is limited to the value of the Pix itself (the nature in that case is ORIGINAL);\n- Pix Withdrawal: the return amount is limited to the withdrawal amount (the nature in this case is WITHDRAWAL);\n- Pix Change: the return value is limited to the value related to the nature of the purchase: \n\n    - ORIGINAL: limited to the value of the purchase;\n\n    - RETIRADA: limited to the value of the withdrawal.","enum":["ORIGINAL","RETIRADA"],"type":"string"},"descricao":{"description":"Text to be presented to the payer containing information about the return. This text will be filled in, in pacs.004 by the creditor PSP, in the RemittanceInformation field.","maxLength":140,"type":"string"},"motivo":{"description":"Description of the return status.","maxLength":140,"type":"string"},"rtrId":{"title":"RtrId","description":"ReturnIdentification transiting PACS004.","maxLength":32,"minLength":32,"type":"string","example":"D12345678202009091000abcde123456"},"status":{"title":"Status","description":"Reversal Status.","enum":["EM_PROCESSAMENTO","DEVOLVIDO","NAO_REALIZADO"],"type":"string"},"valor":{"allOf":[{"title":"Value","pattern":"\\d{1,10}\\.\\d{2}","type":"string"},{"description":"Value to return."}]}}}},"endToEndId":{"title":"EndToEndIdentification","description":"EndToEndIdentification transiting PACS002, PACS004 and PACS008","pattern":"[A-Z0-9]{32}","type":"string"},"horario":{"format":"date-time","title":"Horário","description":"Time when Pix was processed on the PSP.","type":"string"},"infoPagador":{"title":"Free Payer Information.","maxLength":140,"type":"string"},"txid":{"title":"Transaction Identification","description":"# Transaction Identification\nThe txid field, mandatory, determines the transaction identifier.\nThe purpose of this field is to be an element that enables the PSP of the receiver to present the user with the functionality of payment reconciliation.\nOn pacs.008, is referenced as `TransactionIdentification <txId>` or `idConciliacaoRecebedor`.\nThe txid field is limited to 35 characters in pacs.008.\nIn terms of workflow, txid is read by the payer's PSP application and, after payment is confirmed, it is sent to the SPI via pacs.008.\nA pacs.008 is also sent to the receiver's PSP, containing, besides all the usual payment information, the txid.\nWhen you notice a receiving with txid, the PSP of the receiver is able to communicate with the user receiver, informing that a specific payment has been settled.\nTxid is created exclusively by the receiving user and is under his responsibility.\nThe txid, in the context of representation of a collection, is unique by CPF/CNPJ of the receiver user. It is up to the receiving PSP to validate this rule in the PIX API.\n","pattern":"[A-Z0-9]{26,35}","type":"string"},"valor":{"allOf":[{"title":"Value","pattern":"\\d{1,10}\\.\\d{2}","type":"string"},{"description":"Pix value."}]},"componentesValor":{"anyOf":[{"title":"PixComponentsTransferValue","description":"","required":["original"],"type":"object","properties":{"original":{"properties":{"valor":{"type":"string"}},"title":"PixComponentsTransferValue","description":"","required":["valor"],"type":"object","example":{"valor":"80.00"}}},"example":{"original":{"valor":"10.00"}}},{"title":"PixComponentsWithdrawalValue","description":"","required":["saque"],"type":"object","properties":{"saque":{"properties":{"valor":{"type":"string"},"modalidadeAgente":{"type":"string"},"prestadorDeServicoDeSaque":{"type":"string"}},"title":"PixComponentsWithdrawalValue","description":"","required":["prestadorDeServicoDeSaque","valor","modalidadeAgente"],"type":"object","example":{"valor":"20.00","modalidadeAgente":"AGTEC","prestadorDeServicoDeSaque":"12345678"}}},"example":{"saque":{"valor":"20.00","modalidadeAgente":"AGTEC","prestadorDeServicoDeSaque":"12345678"}}},{"title":"PixComponentsChangeValue","description":"","required":["original","troco"],"type":"object","properties":{"original":{"properties":{"valor":{"type":"string"}},"title":"PixComponentsTransferValue","description":"","required":["valor"],"type":"object","example":{"valor":"80.00"}},"troco":{"properties":{"valor":{"type":"string"},"modalidadeAgente":{"type":"string"},"prestadorDoServicoDeSaque":{"type":"string"}},"title":"PixComponentsChangeValue","description":"","required":["modalidadeAgente","prestadorDeServicoDeSaque","valor"],"type":"object","example":{"valor":"20.00","modalidadeAgente":"AGTEC","prestadorDoServicoDeSaque":"12345678"}}},"example":{"original":{"valor":"80.00"},"troco":{"valor":"20.00","modalidadeAgente":"AGTEC","prestadorDoServicoDeSaque":"12345678"}}}],"description":"The objective of this structure is to inform how the received PIX value was composed (information about withdrawal, change or transfer)."}}},"examples":{"retorno1":{"summary":"Exemplo 1","value":{"endToEndId":"E12345678202009091221abcdef12345","txid":"cd1fe328c875481285a6f233ae41b662","valor":"100.00","horario":"2020-09-10T13:03:33.902Z","infoPagador":"Reforma da casa","devolucoes":[{"id":"000AAA111","rtrId":"D12345678202009091000abcde123456","valor":"11.00","horario":{"solicitacao":"2020-09-10T13:03:33.902Z"},"status":"EM_PROCESSAMENTO"}]}},"retorno2":{"summary":"Exemplo carro"}}}}},"description":"Data of the Pix effected."},"401":{"description":"Response when a request is not athorized for the user."},"403":{"content":{"application/problem+json":{"schema":{"title":"Root Type for
